thread.title: Idiots On Twitter Are Breaking Their Thumbs Over This Stupid Tweet About How To Break Your Thumb Ligament
thread.title_full: Idiots On Twitter Are Breaking Their Thumbs Over This Stupid Tweet About How To Break Your Thumb Ligament

author: Brandon Wenerd
title: Idiots On Twitter Are Breaking Their Thumbs Over This Stupid Tweet About How To Break Your Thumb Ligament
text:
It’s just a fact that people are idiots. The hivemind of social media fuels this stupidity, fueling everything from the condom to challenge to things we will forever love, like Bros Icing Bros.
This idiotic tweet showing how to break your thumb ligament “if you’re bored”, however, shows just how dumb people actually are. via The Chive :

People are so stupid that they actually did it.
All of these FOMOing morons seem like prime candidates for the Darwin Award:
